Pre-Game Insights: Philadelphia is on a three-game win streak heading into the game.
The Sacramento Kings have a home game record of 7-12, while the Philadelphia 76ers are 8-8 on the road.
De'Aaron Fox and Kelly Oubre Jr. are highlighted as key performers for their respective teams.
The Kings are 2-6 in games decided by 3 points or fewer, while the 76ers are 2-1 in games decided by less than 4 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings are missing Devin Carter (shoulder) and Jae Crowder (back), while the 76ers have several players out due to injuries.
The 76ers are averaging 111.3 points per game, while the Kings are averaging 114.8 points per game.
